summary: This module implements a comprehensive pipeline that transforms PDF files into structured document objects. It coordinates backend selection, OCR model loading (including EasyOCR, Tesseract, and GLM), page preprocessing, layout analysis, table structure detection, and page assembly, while also providing profiling support for performance monitoring.
business_intent: Enable applications to automatically extract and organize textual content, layout information, tables, and images from PDFs for purposes such as searchable archives, data mining, compliance review, and downstream naturalâ€‘language processing.
